sentences.en: Astringent to the intestine and relieve diarrhea; invigorate digestion .
sentences.cn: 有涩肠止泻?温 中行 气的功能.

sentences.en: Colorectal cancer: Malignant tumour of the large intestine ( colon ) or rectum.
sentences.cn: 结肠直肠癌: 结肠 或直肠的恶性肿瘤.

sentences.en: Erepsin is secreted by glands in the wall of the small intestine.
sentences.cn: 肠肽酶是由小肠壁的腺体分泌的.

sentences.en: In the intestine, free iodine or iodate undergoes reduction to iodide before absorption.
sentences.cn: 在肠内被吸收以前游离碘或碘酸盐还原成碘化物.

sentences.en: Most of the body's cholesterol is made in the liver and intestine from digested food.
sentences.cn: 身体的大部分胆固醇是在肝和肠内由消化的食物制成的.

sentences.en: So far as digestion is concerned, the small intestine is the real champion.
sentences.cn: 论消化, 小肠是真正的冠军.

sentences.en: The colon, or large intestine, distends and fills with gas.
sentences.cn: 结肠，或大肠，因充满气体而膨胀。

sentences.en: The function of the stomach is to digest food sufficiently to enable it to pass into the intestine.
sentences.cn: 胃的功能是充分消化食物,以便让其进入肠道.

sentences.en: The toxin is formed in the small intestine and is absorbed into the blood.
sentences.cn: 毒素是在小肠中形成,并被吸收到血液.

sentences.en: the viscid lining of the intestine
This area is always tender to the touch if the intestines are not functioning properly.
sentences.cn: 如果肠功能不正常的话，这个部位总是一按就痛。

sentences.en: This drug lowers cholesterol levels by binding fats in the intestine.
sentences.cn: 这种药通过黏合肠内的脂肪降低胆固醇水平。

sentences.en: This innervate the adjacent region of the fore and middle intestine.
sentences.cn: 这就为前肠和中肠的邻接部分提供了神经.

sentences.en: This vitamin is absorbed through the walls of the small intestine.
sentences.cn: 这种维生素通过小肠壁被吸收。

sentences.en: Treatment sometimes involves removing the large intestine including the rectum.
sentences.cn: 治疗往往要去掉大肠,其中包括直肠.

sentences.en: Tumors of the small intestine are medical curiosities from several points of view.
sentences.cn: 从几方面看,小肠肿瘤在医学上是罕见的.

trans.tran_en: the long tube in your body through which food passes after it leaves your stomach
